title: Free - All Right Now The Collection [320k MP3]
description:
All Right Now: The Collection is a compilation of tracks from the band Free. 

Nineteen well choosen classic tracks from Free's career. It's a delight. It's also good to see tracks like 'Catch A Train' appear alongside other more known ones. The package is well put together with fine illustrations of their albums, a decorate Disc and interesting sleeve notes too.

For someone who wants a best of, an introduction rather than individual Album or simply enjoys a new sellection of, then this is a admirable choice. The band play their unique blues rock type with fine ability. The songs are top notch and still sound crisp.
